Maybe Named needs a simple getName() method.

timeline.author: Electroid
Electroid

replies.bodyText:
Edit: to answer your original question. It was changed to getUsername() to avoid overriding the Named#getName, so we could support strings rather than components (see below for why).
In my latest commit I resolved the issue related to Contributor. Though I left Username alone and would like some guidance on it.
For Contributor I made use of the getName() method and included a toLegacy() that covers a few places that using a component would prove challenging (e.g. /maps -a flag to match author names), however I was unsure if this was the correct way to go for Username. As there are a few places in the code where it’s acceptable for the username to be null, and currently the Username#getName() will always return a component. So perhaps it makes sense to keep Username#getUsername for when it’s necessary to check if the name is null or not.
Let me know how you’d like this to be handled. Thanks!
replies.author: applenick

timeline.author: Electroid

timeline.bodyText: If this is the only reason we keep getDisplayName, then just remove it from toString.
timeline.author: Electroid

timeline.bodyText: If this is the only reason we have getDisplayName, just remove the logging statements. TBH, we don't need them here.

timeline.message:
Reintroduce support for map gamemode name
* XML can now define <map game = "name"> for custom gamemode names to be displayed in the sidebar.
* Also migrated a large majority of PGM to new text library

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Make Party extend Named again

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Replace PersonalizedPlayer with PlayerComponent

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Switch TranslatableComponent to inline instead of args()

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Clean up Party name methods

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Utilize Named properly for Contributor

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Move TextColor conversion method to TextFormatter

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Complete migration to new text library
A few bugs remain including:
* Vote book clicking issue
* Minecraft key translation bug

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Fix translation issues for non-legacy messages

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

Fix translation issues for non-legacy messages
